name: Blazing Races!
description:
Welcome to Blazing Races!

Race your friends around the track as fast as you can. Be careful though, these engines have a tendency to catch fire! When that happens, press the keys in the order shown above your car to restart the engine before you run out of power!

Controls

Player 1 -
(Use Xbox 360 Controller Joypad 1 or Keyboard)

Steer - WASD / Directional Pad (Left Joystick)
Gas - W  (Right Trigger)
Reverse - S (Left Trigger)
Flip Car - Spacebar

Player 2 -
(Use Xbox 360 Controller Joypad 2 or Keyboard)

Steer - IJKL / Directional Pad (Left Joystick)
Gas - I  (Right Trigger)
Reverse - K (Left Trigger)
Flip Car - /
